scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DB_HOST=localhost DB_USERNAME=node DB_PASSWORD=node DB_DATABASE=schulcloud_calendar_test mocha --recursive --reporter nyan
scripts.test_travis: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DB_HOST=localhost DB_USERNAME=postgres DB_DATABASE=schulcloud_calendar_test mocha --recursive --reporter nyan
scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/*/*.js
